swistrackcomponent.description: A tracker based on the algorithm described in Zhang, Li and Nevatia (Global Data Association for Multi-Object Tracking Using Network Flows.

parameter.name: MaxDistanceForTrack
parameter.label: Maximum Distance between two points to consider linking them.

parameter.name: MaxDifferenceInAreaForSameTrack
parameter.label: Maximum Difference in area for two particle to be considered part of the same track.

parameter.name: MinimumAreaParticle
parameter.label: Minimum number of pixels that should appear in a particle.

parameter.name: WindowSizeSeconds
parameter.label: Window Size - how long to collect particles before associating them as tracks, in seconds.

parameter.name: WindowSizeSeconds
parameter.label: Window Size - how long to collect particles before associating them as tracks, in seconds.
